attributes.action: compusery carrying & use of snow chains for all road vehicles in uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it is rediculas that the our country grinds to a halt because of snow, this costs millions of pounds in lost revenue across all businesses. compusary carrying and use of snow chains should be introduced. Training in how to use these should also be part of the driving test procedure.
this works perfectly in scandinavian countries so why not here in the uk.
come on enough is enough
